title: Gardens of the Caribbean
creator_contributor_role: Royal Horticultural Society (Great Britain), production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Trinidad and Tobago - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Jamaica - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Caribbean Area - Description and travel
description: The climate of the Caribbean fosters exuberantly coloured gardens. In this documentary Anne Swithinbank visits some of the wonderful sights in the area including; swamps and rain forests in Trinidad, Grenada and Golden Eye in Jamaica, Balata Gardens in Martinique, Andromeda Gardens in Barbados, vegetable plots in Jamaica and a squatter's garden in Trinidad. Join Anne for an armchair guide of the fabulous Caribbean.
